feature.label: Neoclipse Feature
feature.description:
Neoclipse is a subproject of Neo4j which aims to provide plugins for the Eclipse IDE in order to support the development of Neo4j applications. Main features:
* visualize the node space * increase/decrease the traversal depth * filter the view by relationship types * add/remove nodes/relationships * create relationship types * add/remove/change properties on nodes and relationships * highlight nodes/relationships in different ways * add icons to nodes
feature.copyright: Neo4j is released under a dual free software/commercial license model (which basically means that it’s “open source” but if you’re interested in using it in commercially, then you must buy a commercial license).
